column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes "A Song of Aryador".
* 1951 - Third day of the Congrès Internationale de Philologie Moderne at the wikipedia:University of Liège
column2: a conference in which J.R.R. Tolkien delivers the paper "Middle English Losenger (essay)".

column1: * 1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letters Letter 276 and Letter 277.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Rose MacNamara.
* 1981 - Author and librarian William Ready dies.
* 2010 - Bulgarian Tolkien Societys 6th Tolkien-Fest in wikipedia:Sofia.
* 2012 - An updated edition of Charles Dixon and David T. Wenzels The Hobbit (comic book) is published.
* 2014 - Tolkien at Exeter College by John Garth is published.
* 2015 - Oxonmoot 2015 at http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antonys College.
